title: Joining tables & Creating and publishing scholarly articles with Quarto and GitHub pages
Research Design
assignment_title_long: Select one of the 7 manuscripts provided
assignment_description: With your partner, choose a paper to work with.  Ideally, we will need 2 pairs (i.e. 4 people) per paper.  One pair will be responsible for presenting the paper as if they are the "authors":  the highlight the key findings, the importance, and the relevance of the work.  The other pair will act as "reviewers" and will present what they feel are the biggest shortcomings, limitations and oversights, along with recommendations for how to improve the work.

title: Waste Research
assignment_title_long: Present your defence or critique of the manuscript selected, in partners
